title: Third place in Emerging SBC’s
description: IEEE MEC SB Computer Society was awarded third place in emerging SBC’s by IEEE CSKS.

title: Ibeto- Silver Winner of The Darrel Chong Student Activity Award.
description: Innovations for a better tomorrow was awarded Silver winner of the Darrel Chong Student Activity Award.

title: Indriya 3.0-Bronze Winner of The Darrel Chong Award.
description: Indriya 3.0 was awarded Bronze Winner of the Darrel Chong Award.

title: Launching of SIGHT
description: Special Interest Group on Humanitarian Technologies was launched under IEEE MEC SB.

title: Outstanding Volunteer Award
description: Chairperson of 2020 IEEE MEC SB Christina Ann Zachariah was awarded the Outstanding Volunteer Award (Humanitarian).

title: Best Event - IEEE Kochi Subsection
description: Empneo 4.0, an event conducted for students from classes 8 to 12 was awarded Honorable Mention for Best Event by IEEE Kochi Subsection.

title: Outstanding Student Branch-Kochi Subsection.
description: IEEE MEC SB was awarded Outstanding Student Branch by Kochi Subsection

title: IEEE Darrel Chong Student Activity Award
description: Empneo 3.0 was awarded IEEE Darrel Chong Student Activity Award 2020 Silver Category

title: Best SB in Aura by IEEE LINK
description: IEEE MEC SB was awarded the best SB in AURA conducted by IEEE LINK.

title: Outstanding Student Volunteer of Kochi Subsection
description: Sreehari A.S. (Chairman, IEEE MEC SB-2020) was awarded outstanding Student Volunteer of Kochi Subsection.

title: Outstanding Professional Member of Kochi Subsection
description: Dr. M. V. Rajesh was awarded Outstanding Professional Member of Kochi Subsection.

title: Outstanding Student Branch-Kochi Subsection
description: IEEE MEC SB was awarded Outstanding Student Branch by the Kochi Subsection.

title: Industrial Application Society
description: The Industrial Applications Society was started under IEEE MEC SB.

title: Signal Processing Society
description: IEEE Signal Processing Society was started under IEEE MEC SB

title: Larry K Wilson Award
description: Sahil Sameer, the Secretary of IEEE MEC SB 2019 won Larry K Wilson Regional Student Volunteer award.

title: Power and Energy Society
description: The Power and Energy  Society was started under IEEE MEC SB

title: Best EMBS Student Chapter
description: The EMBS Student Chapter of IEEE MEC SB was awarded EMBS Student Chapter by the IEEE Kerala Section.

title: EMBS
description: Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society was founded.

title: Computer Society
description: The Computer Society was started under IEEE MEC SB.

title: Women In Engineering
description: Women In Engineering Society was started under IEEE MEC SB.
